starting: ^Greetings traveler! Are you the chosen one sent from on high?
^ Depends. What am I needed for?

c-0: ^Yes!There is an ancient  prophecy in this realm of a chosen one sent from on high . A chosen one sent to dispel the shadows that plague our lands.
^Will you be the one to exorcise our realm?
c-1: ^Two evil doers have ransacked and oppressed our realm for a century now. I have sat idly by here, waiting for the chosen one to smite these demons and restore peace to our land.
^Do you have what it takes to fight them?
c-2: ^I am Demorious, Guardian of Deliverance. It is my oath bound duty to guide the chosen one. Pleased to make your acquiantance.
